text: Thomas Tanner may refer to: *Thomas Tanner (bishop) (1674–1735), English antiquary and prelate *Thomas Tanner (writer) (1630–1682), English clergyman and writer *Thomas Hawkes Tanner (1824–1871), English physician *Thomas Tanner (politician) (1830–1918), New Zealand politician *Thomas Tanner (MP) (died 1401), MP for Wells
title: Thomas Tanner
